description.en:
The highly-anticipated CLANNAD 4-Koma anthology is here!

Finally, CLANNAD makes its appearance in the Magical Cute 4-Koma series of comic anthologies!

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
『CLANNAD』待望の4コマアンソロジー!!

ついについに、マジキュー4コマに『CLANNAD』が登場です!
大絶賛放映中のTVアニメにフルボイス版発売と、まさに「CLANNAD祭り」の
今、マジキュー4コマもこもわた遥華、須田さぎり、坂巻あきむ、風華チルヲ、ZENなどなど
精鋭揃いの執筆陣で負けじとフィーチャーしていきます!
どっぷりCLANNADに浸かっちゃってください!!!

執筆作家陣:こもわた遙華/伊能津/須田さぎり/ZEN/草壁レイ/如月慎一
荒木風羽/桜みさき/双葉ますみ/黒八/空木あんぐ/RikaON
坂巻あきむ/風華チルヲ/サオトメタキ/藤井亮/トナリノ/paco/タカ

description.en:
**The Key to Surgical Success: Seongil Seoul Hospital is the ultimate battleground.**

Surgical specialist Jinwon Yoo receives a covert request for surgery from Wooje Seong, the chairman of South Korea’s largest conglomerate, **Seongil Group**.

At last, the chance for revenge has arrived!

Can Jinwon Yoo, armed with nothing but a scalpel, surpass Seongil Seoul Hospital and seize control of the Seongil Group?  
A fight everyone thought was impossible is about to begin.
description.pt-br:
**Condições para o sucesso da cirurgia: Seongil Hospital de Seul é o campo de batalha perfeito.**

O especialista em cirurgia, Jinwon Yoo, recebe uma solicitação confidencial de cirurgia do presidente do maior conglomerado da Coreia do Sul, o **Grupo Seongil**, Wooje Seong.

Finalmente, a oportunidade de vingança chegou!

Será que Jinwon Yoo conseguirá, com apenas um bisturi, superar o Hospital Seongil de Seul e tomar o controle do Grupo Seongil?  
Uma batalha que todos consideravam impossível está prestes a começar.

title.en: The Villainess' Blind Date Is Too Perfect

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Boyfriend Is So Perfect
The Villain's Match Is Too Perfect
The Devil's Match Is Too Perfect

altTitles.zh: 恶女的相亲对象太完美了

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Match Is Too Perfect

description.en:
Possessed by the rumored evil woman ‘Yvonne Argenthoz’! In her original work, she was a villain who met a tragic end because she was jealous of the female lead with her male lead, but after being possessed by her, Yvonne resolves to enjoy the life of a diamond spoon in peace.

But the novel and development are different?!

“If it’s Yvonne's… fishery, I think it’ll be fine.”

From the perfect match going straight to Yvonne out of the blue, and the unexpected dark side of the story. Will Yvonne be able to live a peaceful diamond spoon life as planned?

altTitles.ja-ro: 12-nin no Shinitai Kodomo-tachi

altTitles.ja: 十二人の死にたい子どもたち

description.en: The story is a locked-room mystery where 12 kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Hunter là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy, từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến những cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Hunter với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi sắp 12 tuổi, Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào kỳ thi Hunter, ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapika, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một Hunter... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.es-la: El Hijo Menor del Renombrado Clan Mágico

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Magic Clan

description.en:
As the author of "Swordmaster Sade," Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton, a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough, Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began. 

With almost no knowledge about the current timeline, will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?

altTitles.ja-ro: Anemone wa Netsu o Obiru

altTitles.ja: アネモネは熱を帯びる

description.en: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?
description.id: Nagisa Ootsuki melepaskan dirinya yang dulu karena malu karena gagal dalam ujian masuk sekolah menengahnya. Pada hari pertamanya di sekolah menengah barunya, siapa yang dia temui selain gadis yang membuatnya gagal dalam ujian! Bagaimana Nagisa menghadapi emosi yang rumit ini?
description.pt: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de chumbar nos exames de admissão ao liceu. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a rapariga que a fez chumbar no exame! Como é que Nagisa lida com estas complicadas emoções?
description.pt-br: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de reprovar no exame de admissão ao Ensino Médio. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a menina que a fez falhar na prova! Como Nagisa lidará com estas emoções complicadas?

title.en: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu

altTitles.ja: 魔王と竜王に育てられた少年は学園生活を無双するようです

altTitles.en: The Boy Raised by the Demon Queen and the Dragon Queen Has No Rival

description.en: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
description.ja:
「魔王」と「竜王」の力を継ぐ少年の無双ファンタジー！
才能ゼロの少年ルイシャは、ある日謎の穴に落ちてしまう。その先にいたのは、巨乳で美人の「魔王」と褐色幼女の「竜王」！　2人から300年の修行を受け、少年は魔族と竜族の力に覚醒する！　ちょっとだけHな少年の英雄譚が、タテ読みフルカラーで開幕！

altTitles.ja: ダブルアーツ

description.en:
A boy and a girl are forced to join hands for all eternity!?  
In a land ravaged by an epidemic known as "Troy", the only people with healing arts capable of stopping the seizures caused by the disease are the Sisters. Although they have a high resistance to the disease, they are searching for a person who is truly immune, so that they can find a cure. The main character is Sister Elraine, one of the Sisters who becomes infected with Troy. But, when she touches Kiri, a seemingly ordinary boy, her seizures stop. Could he be the one!?

title.en: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gal ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai

altTitles.ja: 毎日家に来るギャルが距離感ゼロでも優しくない THE COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gyaru ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai

altTitles.en: The Gal Who Comes to My House Every Day has Zero Boundaries but Isn't Kind

description.en: Class queen Manami Fuwa has been gaining weight lately. To make matters worse, a rival girl is taunting her in class, calling her a "kin-nikuman" (golden meat bun). When Taichi Utsuki can't contain his thoughts about her weight, he's forced to accompany Fuwa on her diet!
description.ja: クラスカースト最上位ギャルの不破満天は、最近ちょっと太り気味。あげく教室で対立するギャルからは「無様な豚」とこき下ろされてしまう。２人のケンカに巻き込まれた太一は、圧し掛かってきた不破に対し、思わず「重いですぅ」と言ってしまい……、そこから不破に絡まれる日々が始まってしまうのだった!!
description.pt-br: A rainha da classe, Manami Fuwa, tem ganhado peso ultimamente. Para piorar as coisas, uma garota rival está zombando dela na sala de aula, chamando-a de "bola de músculo com dinheiro". Quando Taichi Utsuki não consegue conter seus pensamentos sobre o peso dela, ele é obrigado a acompanhar Fuwa em sua dieta! Uma comédia romântica sobre fazer dieta com uma garota violenta, irracional, egoísta e sem noção de distância emocional começa.

altTitles.ja: 異種族レビュアーズ

description.en:
In our world, the human race constantly debates about several important issues, such as: which girl is the best girl? How good is something as fapping material? Which fetish is the sexiest? And why your Waifu is the best while everyone else has shit taste. 

Accompany these great warriors as they present us with different girls, different opinions, different boners, and show us that the fantasy world may not be all that different from ours, as they analyze and meticulously review the most important thing of all: what they should put their **** in.
description.ru: Действие манги происходит в вымышленном мире, населённом различными расами разумных существ, в котором существует процветающий рынок интимных услуг. Благодаря такому высокому развитию секс-индустрии в мире появились профессиональные критики, специализирующиеся исключительно на оценке качества проституток. Одними из них являются человек Станк и эльф Зел, путешествующие из города в город для оценки каждого местного квартала красных фонарей, после чего посылают свои обзоры для составления сводного рейтинга борделей. Объединившись с ангелом по имени Крим, критики собирают информацию о сексуальных достоинствах всех видов живых существ этого мира, получая удовольствие от процесса и зарабатывая попутно дополнительные деньги.
description.es-la: En nuestro mundo, la raza humana debate constantemente sobre varios temas importantes, como por ejemplo: ¿Cual chica es la mejor? ¿Y qué tan buena es como material de masturbación? ¿Qué fetiche es el más sexy? Acompaña a estos grandes guerreros, que se presentan con diferentes chicas, diferentes opiniones, diferentes erecciones, y que nos muestran que un mundo de fantasía puede no ser tan diferente al nuestro.
description.pt-br: Em nosso mundo, a raça humana debate constantemente várias questões importantes, como: qual é a melhor garota? Quão bom é um material para se masturbar? Qual fetiche é o mais sexy?... Acompanhe esses grandes guerreiros enquanto eles nos apresentam garotas diferentes, opiniões diferentes, tesões diferentes e nos mostram que o mundo da fantasia pode não ser tão diferente do nosso.

title.en: Is a Mother in Her 30s Like Me Alright?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaamama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.ja: アラサーママの私でいいの？

altTitles.zh: 三十多岁当妈的我也可以吗？

altTitles.vi: Bà mẹ đơn thân ngoài 30 như chị liệu ổn chứ?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaa mama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.en: I'm around 30 is it OK with me?

altTitles.ru: С такой матерью как я, которой за 30, всё ли будет хорошо?

description.en: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is… he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
description.ru: 20 летний студент университета, говорит 32-летней матери-одиночки, что она ему нравится . Дело в том... Что он не особенно стесняется того, почему она ему нравится.
description.uk:
20-річний студент зізнався у коханні своїй 32-річній сусідці матері-одиначці. Справа в тому... Що він зовсім не *соромиться* розказувати про те, чому закоханий у неї.

[Офіційно] прохання виразити свої думки та враження від манґи у [цьому опитуванні.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform)
description.vi: Shiraishi Hanano là một người phụ nữ 32 tuổi. Một ngày nọ, cô nhận được lời tỏ tình từ người hàng xóm Yoshio-kun, một sinh viên đại học. Cậu ta khăng khăng muốn cưới cô ấy làm vợ, thậm chí không quan tâm cả việc cô ấy đã từng kết hôn hay có một đứa con gái
description.pt-br:
Uma mãe solteira de 32 anos ouve de seu vizinho, um estudante universitário de cerca de 20, que ele gosta dela. A coisa é… ele não é particularmente tímido sobre por que gosta dela.  
  
[Oficial] Por favor, responda [this survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform) para dar seus pensamentos e impressões!

title.en: Watashi o Aisuru Sannin no Danna-sama

altTitles.ja: 私を愛する3人の旦那さま

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi wo Aisuru 3-nin no Danna-sama

altTitles.en: My Three Husbands Who Love Me

description.en: Rio Yamabuki died saving a cat. When she wakes up, she finds herself 15 years in the past, on the day her husband proposed to her. She believed that marrying him would bring her happiness. However, the reality was a disastrous marriage filled with her husband's abuse, caring for his parents, and ultimately being killed by her husband and his lover for insurance money. A grim reaper appears and tells her, "Redo your marriage as you wish." If she can redo her life from rock bottom, this time she will live for herself and seize happiness!! Just when she thought that, three high-spec men claiming to be her husband appear...!?
description.ja:
猫を助けて死んでしまった山吹理央（やまぶきりお）。

目を覚ますと、そこは15年前に、旦那からプロポーズをされる日だった。

この人と結婚すれば幸せになれると信じていた。
しかし現実は、旦那のモラハラ、義家族の介護、仕舞いには保険金目当てに
旦那と不倫相手の親友に殺された散々な結婚。

そこへ死神が現れ、猫を助けた代わりに、「お前の望む結婚をやり直せ」と言う。

どん底人生をやり直せるなら、今度こそ自分のために生きて幸せをつかみ取る！！
・・・と思った矢先、理央の旦那だと名乗るハイスぺ男が「３人」も現れて・・・！？

title.en: Moushin Listener: Falling in Love with a Dark Streamer

altTitles.ja: 妄信リスナー 闇堕ち配信者に恋して

description.en: A friend stabbed a popular streamer to death. University student Asagiri Hina returns to six months ago to save her friend who went crazy and fell in love with the handsome streamer Ravi. However, Ravi was a scumbag who exploited his fans' affection and sold them to the sex industry. To prevent the tragedy from repeating, Hina decides to break her friend's brainwashing. Can she avoid the tragic end!? A story of desires born from the internet society

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?
Kirby of the Stars: Daily Round Diary!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Kirby - Kyou mo Manmaru Nikki!

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ 今日もまんまる日記！

description.en: He's pink and round! He's a glutton! A new manga series about Kirby, the airheaded but irresistible hero of the video game world! Lots of copy abilities are here! Plus, the familiar members such as King Dedede, Waddle Dee, and Meta Knight, as well as such and such characters from previous Kirby titles, are all gathered together! The definitive version of the hilarious Kirby manga!

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

title.en: Isn't Being a Wicked Woman Much Better?

altTitles.en: The Perks of Being a Villainess
What's Wrong with Being the Villainess?
Being a Wicked Woman Is Much Better
Being a Wicked Woman Is Comfortable and Pleasant

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

altTitles.pt: Ser uma vilã não é muito melhor?

altTitles.es-la: ¿No es mucho mejor ser una mujer malvada?

altTitles.th: เป็นนางร้ายก็สบายดีนะคะ

altTitles.ja: 悪女は楽で最高ですが？

altTitles.zh: 因为是恶女所以很舒服

altTitles.vi: Làm ác nữ bộ không tuyệt sao?

description.en:
She possessed a villainess who is known and hated for her evil acts in an unpopular novel. But because of her personality, it was extremely difficult for her to play the villainess role. But not for long…

“I’ll fix your dress according to your taste this instant!”

“My request.”

“O-Of course! As per your request, there’s only one piece available in the whole Empire.”

People around me listen to me well even if I just frown and sit still. Since I don’t have to live in difficulty, I decided to just comfortably live on as a villainess.

“Father. Is it necessary for you to solve formulas in this slow and inefficient way?”

I thought it would be good to be a rich villainess, so I used all my knowledge.

“Why don’t you give me the honor of escorting the Princess?”

I have had enough of dealing with my father, so why did an unexpected character suddenly appear? What if this person disrupts my plan?

---
Dohee lived as a pushover, died miserably, and was reborn in a novel as a notorious villainess. But it turns out that her new life is not without its perks, as Deborah Seymour is also the richest villain alive. Now, all that's left for her to do is lay low and enjoy her carefree lifestyle...if not for the fact that Deborah is fated to be sent to a monastery! Will this ex-doormat find a way to avoid yet another tragic ending, or will the challenges of being a villainess be too much for her?

---

description.fr:
Dohee a vécu comme une poule mouillée, a péri misérablement et a été réincarnée dans un roman en tant que vilaine notoire. Mais il s'avère que sa nouvelle vie n'est pas sans avantages, car Deborah Seymour est aussi la méchante la plus riche de l'Empire. Il ne lui reste plus qu'à faire profil bas et à profiter de son insouciance... Si ce n'est que Deborah est condamnée à être envoyée dans un monastère! Cette ancienne fainéante trouvera-t-elle un moyen d'éviter une nouvelle fin tragique, ou les défis d'une méchante seront-ils trop importants pour elle?

description.hr:
Yoon Dohee, studentica arhitektonskog fakulteta, otkriva da ju njezine kolege i obitelj iskorištavaju za novac i kao besplatnu radnu snagu točno prije nego pogine u prometnoj nesreći.
Umjesto da zapravo umre ona se reinkarnira u ljubavni roman koji je nedavno čitala, ali ne kao glavni lik, nego kao glavni zlikovac i antagonist knjige Deborah Seymour.
Sada kao Deborah ona navigira novi život odmarajući se u bogatstu i raskoši, ali mora biti na oprezu jer je njezina reputacija duboko pod zemljom, a lik Debore u originalnoj knjizi završava svoju priču u tamnici.
description.id:
Kehidupan Yoon Dohee, wanita naif yang kerap dimanfaatkan oleh orang sekitarnya berubah drastis. Setelah dia mengalami kecelakaan dan sekarat, dia merasuk ke dalam tubuh wanita jahat bernama Deborah Seymour. Deborah Seymour adalah seorang tokoh di novel reverse harem rating 19+ berjudul 'A Dark Thorn Through My Throat'. Karena tidak ingin ada orang lain yang tahu kalau sebenarnya Yoon Dohee adalah wanita naif, dia akhirnya belajar untuk menjadi jahat seperti Deborah Seymour. "Aku tidak akan hidup sebagai orang yang baik dan menyedihkan seperti di masa lalu. Aku akan terus hidup enak sebagai wanita jahat!"

description.uk:
Ду Хі опанувала тіло лиходійки одного непопулярного роману, яка була відома і ненависна всім за свої погані вчинки. Але через власний характер їй дуже важко правильно грати роль злодійки. Але ненадовго.. 

"Я зміню сукню згідно з вашим смаком негайно" 

"Моє прохання." 

"З-звісно! Згідно з вашим запитом, у всій імперії є лише одна річ." 

Люди навколо мене добре слухають, навіть якщо я просто хмурюсь і сиджу на місці. Оскільки мені не доводиться жити в труднощах, я вирішила просто комфортно жити у тілі лиходійки. 

«Батько, чи потрібно вам розв’язувати формули таким повільним і неефективним способом?» 

Я подумала, що було б добре бути багатою негідницею, тому використовувала усі свої знання. 

«Чому б вам не надати мені честь супроводжувати принцесу?» 

У мене досить багато справ з батьком, так чому раптом з’явився цей неочікуваний персонаж? Що, якщо ця людина спробує порушити мій план?

description.en: Earth had been invaded by creatures from another dimension, and it has been a few years since peace was restored, thanks to the help of various supernatural humans that revealed themselves during this invasion. Gwangik Yu, our protagonist, was born between two supernatural parents. His father is an immortal while his mother is a transformer with exceptional physical abilities along with the power to transform into beasts. Neither parent, however, is aware of each spouse’s power and both want Gwangik to follow in their footsteps.
description.ko:
나는 인베이더를 죽이는 사람이 되고 싶다. 
―
인베이더를 죽이고 특수종의 세상에 살며 일상의 행복도 유지하고 싶다. 
그걸 바라면 안 될까? 
왜? 왜 그래서는 안 되나. 
두 마리 토끼를 쫓다가는 둘 다 놓친다고 하지만, 
안 놓치면 된다.

title.en: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.

「あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。」異世界おっさん教師 突然のモテ期に困惑する

altTitles.ja-ro: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.": Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru

altTitles.zh: 那个时候被你拯救了的那个魔物娘是我的说。

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.
description.pt-br: Cerca de 20 anos se passaram desde que o protagonista foi convocado para outro mundo e se aposentou do exército. Ele ainda está solteiro na casa dos 40 anos e vive como um professor de baixo escalão, até que um dia, uma 'garota monstro' de elite é transferida para sua classe.

title.en: Act Like a Boss Monster, Mr. Swallow!

altTitles.ru: Ведите себя как подобает боссу подземелья, господин Сваллоу!

altTitles.en: The Unbeatable Dungeon's Lazy Boss Monster
Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss

altTitles.es-la: Actúe como un jefecito final, Sr. devorador

description.en:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?

altTitles.ja: ナルト
-ナルト-
NARUTO -ナルト-

altTitles.th: นินจาคาถาโอ้โฮเฮะ

description.bg: Тайното село Коноха. Проблемният възпитаник на Нинджа академията Наруто и днес не спира с белите! Огромната мечта на същия този Наруто е да приеме званието на историческия герой Хокаге и да стане нинджа, като надмине всички предишни Хокаге. Ала около раждането на Наруто изглежда витае една тайна...!?
description.cs: Stát se nejlepším nindžou na světě není věc snadná, dokonce ani když nejste obecně zatracovaný outsider, který má v sobě zapečetěného devítiocasého démona, jenž kdysi málem srovnal se zemí celou nindžovskou vesnici. Naruto je však pevně odhodlaný splnit si tento sen a vzdát se za žádných okolností nehodlá. Nejspíš proto, že neví, co to slovo znamená (a prakticky určitě ho nedokáže správně napsat).
description.de: Naruto ist ein berüchtigter Tunichtgut in seinem Dorf, das fast ausschließlich aus Ninja besteht. Er liebt Nudelsuppe und spielt anderen gern Streiche. So ist es kein Wunder, dass er nicht gerade beliebt ist. Doch gerade deshalb will er der beste Ninja seines Dorfes werden. Zu diesem Zweck gehen er und seine Mitschüler Sasuke und Sakura beim großen Meister Kakashi in die Lehre...
description.en:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  


---
description.es:
En la Villa Oculta de la Hoja, un chaval de lo más problemático que estudia en la escuela de ninjas, Naruto, se dedica a urdir gamberrada tras gamberrada. El sueño de Naruto es el de llegar un día a heredar el nombre de Hokage, reservado a los grandes héroes, y de convertirse en el mejor ninja de todos los tiempos. ¿¡Podrá Naruto llegar a cumplir sus anhelos de grandeza...!?

---
La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.fi:
Konohan ninjakylässä ilman vanhempia varttunut Naruto Uzumaki on ninjakoulun heikoimpia oppilaita. Mutta Narutossa piilee voimia, jotka ylittävät inhimilliset rajat... Naruto on vauhdikas seikkailutarina ninjanuorukaisesta ja hänen ystävistään, taisteluista, toveruudesta ja kunniasta. Sekä kotimaassaan että ulkomailla huippusuosittu sarja pohjautuu taruihin Japanin historian mystisistä ninjasotureista. 

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille.
description.fr: Naruto est un garçon un peu spécial. Il est toujours tout seul et son caractère fougueux ne l'aide pas vraiment à se faire apprécier dans son village. Malgré cela, il garde au fond de lui une ambition: celle de devenir un maître Hokage, la plus haute distinction dans l'ordre des ninjas, et ainsi obtenir la reconnaissance de ses pairs.
description.id: Ini adalah Desa Konohagakure... Naruto adalah salah satu murid di Akademi Ninja yang suka berbuat onar!! Impian Naruto adalah menjadi seorang Hokage. Tetapi, Naruto memiliki rahasia sejak lahir karena di dalam tubuhnya terdapat siluman rubah yang disegel! Inilah petualangan Naruto untuk mewujudkan impiannya...
description.it:
"Naruto" è incentrato sulle avventure di un ragazzino, Uzumaki Naruto, che vuole diventare un famoso ninja e lasciare un segno nella storia. Gli ostacoli sul suo cammino sono però molti, come le prove che dovrà sostenere e i rivali che dovrà affrontare...

---
Naruto Uzumaki è un ragazzo dodicenne del Villaggio della Foglia che insegue il sogno di diventare Hokage, cioè il ninja più forte, nonché capo del villaggio. Il giovane custodisce in sé un segreto di cui lui stesso è all'oscuro: all'interno del suo corpo è sigillato un demone, conosciuto come Volpe a Nove Code, che attaccò il villaggio dodici anni prima e fu sigillato dal Quarto Hokage in cambio della vita. Per questo motivo, Naruto è stato sempre associato allo spirito demoniaco ed è cresciuto isolato da tutti. Dopo l'ennesima bocciatura di Naruto all'esame dell'accademia per il diploma di Genin, il suo maestro Iruka Umino lo salva dal maestro traditore Mizuki che lo aveva spinto a rubare un rotolo contenente delle tecniche proibite. In questo frangente, Naruto scopre finalmente il suo segreto. Questo, unito al desiderio di salvare Iruka, gli dà la spinta necessaria a sconfiggere Mizuki con la Tecnica Superiore della Moltiplicazione del Corpo, appresa dal rotolo. Grazie a questa dimostrazione di coraggio, il ragazzo riesce a guadagnarsi la promozione a Genin ed entra a far parte della Squadra 7 insieme a Sakura Haruno e Sasuke Uchiha, sotto la guida del maestro Kakashi Hatake.
description.ja: ここは木ノ葉隠れの里。忍術学校の問題児、ナルトは今日もイタズラ三昧！！　そんなナルトのでっかい夢は歴代の勇者、火影の名を受けついで、先代を越える忍者になることだ。だがナルトには出生の秘密が…！？
description.pl: Osada Konoha-gakure. Naruto, uczeń szkoły dla ninja, rozrabia jak tylko potrafi! Mimo to, jego marzeniem jest pokonanie "Hokage", czyli aktualnego przywódcy wojowników. Gdy Naruto się rodził, wydarzyło się coś, o czym on sam wciąż jeszcze nie wie...
description.pt: La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.ru: Двенадцать лет назад, мощный Девятихвостый Демон-Лис напал на деревню ниндзя, Коноху. Демон был быстро побежден и запечатан в младенце по имени Наруто Узумаки. Но для этого, главному ниндзя Конохи, четвёртому хокаге пришлось пожертвовать жизнью… Теперь, по прошествии 12-и лет, Наруто является номером один среди придурков ниндзя, который полон решимости стать следующим Хокаге и получить признание всех, кто когда-либо сомневался в нем!
description.sr: Jedan od najpopularnijih naslova širom sveta sada je konačno dostupan i domaćim čitaocima. Serijal prati avanture dečaka Naruta, koji pokušava da postane veliki ratnik i nadmaši sve prethodnike. Ali moraće najpre da se bori sa samim sobom.
description.tr:
Naruto, ünlü mangaka Masaşi Kişimoto tarafından yaratılan, 1999 yılından beri Japonya’da yayınlanan dünyaca ünlü manga serisi artık Türkiye’de.

Bugüne kadar Japonya’da 100 milyondan fazla satan Naruto serisi, 2002 yılında bu başarısı taçlandırarak animeye uyarlandı. Ülkemizde de gösterilen bu anime, manga kültürünü dünyaya tanıtıp; Naruto’yu dünyadaki en önemli mangalardan biri haline getirdi. Yıllardan beri geniş bir hayran kitlesi tarafından Türkçe’de yayınlanması beklenen bu eser, manganın özünden hiçbir şey kaybetmemesine özen gösterilerek ve Japonya’da olduğu gibi sağdan sola okunacak biçimde hazırlandı. Yediden yetmişe herkese hitap eden Naruto, çizgi roman kültürü ile ilgili olmayanların bile severek okuyabileceği bir eser.
description.uk: Дванадцять років тому, потужний Дев'ятихвостий Демон-Лис напав на селище Коноху. Демон був швидко переможений і запечатаний в дитинку на ім'я Наруто Узумакі. Але для цього, головному ніндзя Конохи, четвертому хокаге довелося пожертвувати життям... Тепер, після 12-и років, Наруто є номером один серед ніндзя, який сповнений рішучості стати наступним Хокаґе та отримати визнання всіх, хто коли-небудь сумнівався в ньому!

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.vi: Một nữ tu sĩ trẻ đã thành lập nhóm phiêu lưu đầu tiên của mình, nhưng gần như ngay lập tức họ thấy mình đang đau khổ. Đó là Goblin Slayer đến giải cứu — một người đã cống hiến cuộc sống của mình cho việc tiêu diệt tất cả những yêu tinh, bằng mọi cách cần thiết. Và khi những tin đồn về những kỳ công của anh ấy bắt đầu lan truyền, thì không ai nói được ai có thể gọi tới...
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

altTitles.ja: チュートリアルが死ぬほど難しい

description.en:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.
description.ja:
元プロゲーマーの堂山海は、ある日突然「チュートリアル」という名の異空間に招待された。 軽い気持ちで最凶クラスの難易度「ヘル」を選択してしまった彼は、離脱不可能、生存率ほぼゼロの「死にゲー」に挑むことになってしまった。 殺伐としたこの世界で生き残るために課せられたミッションをクリアしながら、チュートリアルに秘められた秘密を解き明かしていく。

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8A%9C%ED%86%A0%EB%A6%AC%EC%96%BC%EC%9D%B4-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%96%B4%EB%A0%B5%EB%8B%A4/2467)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/71905)
description.ko:
gandara 퓨전 판타지 장편소설 '튜토리얼이 너무 어렵다' 가 웹툰으로 독자 여러분을 찾아갑니다.

삶이 무료하던 어느 날, 내 눈앞에 나타난 초대 메세지. 
[튜토리얼 세계에 입장하시겠습니까?] 

그리고 뒤이어 나타난 난이도 선택 창. 
[이지] [노말] [하드] [헬] 나는 주저없이 헬 난이도를 선택했다. 

그리고 후회했다. 

아무리 헬 난이도라지만, 이건 너무 심하잖아.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8A%9C%ED%86%A0%EB%A6%AC%EC%96%BC%EC%9D%B4-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%96%B4%EB%A0%B5%EB%8B%A4/2467)
---

description.ru:
Однажды, посреди серых скучных будней, перед глазами появляется уведомление. [Вы хотите пройти обучение?]

За ним сразу же вылезло окно выбора сложности. [Лёгкая] [Обычная] [Сложная] [Адская]. Я без колебаний выбрал адскую сложность.

И пожалел.
Знаю, она называется адской, но это слишком.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8A%9C%ED%86%A0%EB%A6%AC%EC%96%BC%EC%9D%B4-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%96%B4%EB%A0%B5%EB%8B%A4/2467)
---

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

altTitles.vi: Cách thức trở thành gia đình

altTitles.ja: 家族になる方法

description.en: Do-yeon and Eun-ha, who became a family due to their parents' remarriage, become strangers again due to their parents' divorce. The two met again after many years. Eun-ha is obsessed with Do-yeon, and Do-yeon is burdened by his younger brother... What's even worse is that his feelings for Eunha are not 'brotherly love'.

title.en: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero

description.en:
Twenty years.

For twenty long years, the thirteenth saint Lee Geon was trapped inside the Tower of Demons after being backstabbed by twelve of his allies. These twelve "saints" were warriors chosen by the twelve Zodiac gods to defeat mysterious monsters called "calamities" that were massacring the planet. Though no god had chosen Geon as a saint, he became the mightiest of them all, which made him a hero... and a target.

But now, Geon has brawled his way out of the tower, and he's back stronger than ever. All that's left is to exact brutal payback on each of the saints, but none of these powerful beings will go down without a fight.

Will Geon be able to stay in one piece while achieving the divine revenge of his dreams?

---

- [Tapas English Translation](https://tapas.io/series/the-return-of-the-disaster-class-hero/info)
description.fr:
Il était une fois un héros qui considéré autre fois comme le plus puissant de la Terre.

« Mais il est mort… Comment une personne désignée comme morte pourrait-il revenir ? »
« Ouais, j’aimerais bien voir ça, moi aussi. »

Mais 20 années plus tard, il revint.

« Pourquoi êtes-vous aussi choqués, les gars ? À voir vos gueules, on pourrait croire que vous vous sentez coupable ? »

‘Ces enfoirés… je vais pas les laisser s’en tirer comme ça…’
description.ko:
지상에 최강의 영웅이 있었다.

“하지만 죽었잖아. 우리가 죽인 놈이 어떻게 돌아와?”
“그러게. 돌아올 수 있으면 한번 돌아와 보라지.”

그런데 20년 만에 진짜 돌아와 버렸다?

“뭘 그리 놀래? 왜. 양심에 찔릴 짓이라도 하셨나?”

이 XX들. 가만 안 둔다.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy4PeK3mCrI)
description.pt-br:
Eu era o maior herói da Terra.

“Mas ele está morto. Como aquele cara que matamos está de volta?”

“Não sei.”

Eu realmente voltei depois de 20 anos?

“Por que estão tão surpresos? Fizeram algo para ficar com a consciência pesada?”

Seus desgraçados. Vocês não perdem por esperar.

altTitles.ja: 墨香 DARK LADY

altTitles.th: มุกฮยาง ดาร์กเลดี้

altTitles.pt-br: Mook Hyang – As aventuras de Dark

description.de: Der einzigartige Kampfkünstler und stolze Herrscher der Dämonensekte, Mookhyang, landet durch einen Fluch der gegnerischen Blutsekte in einer geheimnisvollen Fantasy-Welt. Doch wenn herauskommt, welch unglaubliche Kontrolle Mookhyang über Qi oder Mana hat, ist es nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis er erneut verflucht wird ... und sich in eine junge Frau verwandelt!? Wird die Macht über chinesische Kampfkunst in dieser Welt der Elfen, Magier und Drachen ausreichen, damit ein Mann (oder eine Frau) wieder nach Hause zurückkehren kann? Oder wird dieser arme Krieger letztendlich eine Niederlage erleiden?
description.en:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyang’s incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it’s only a matter of time before he gets cursed again… and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat? 

[Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

description.fr: Mookhyang, pratiquant des arts martiaux et hiérarche de la Secte Démoniaque, se retrouve plongé dans un univers fantastique après avoir été victime d'une malédiction de la part de son ennemi, la Secte du Sang. Mais lorsque les capacités de contrôle du Qi (ou « mana ») de Mookhyang sont révélées au grand jour, ce dernier se retrouve bientôt à nouveau maudit... et transformé en... jeune fille ! Dans cet univers où vivent elfes, mages, chevaliers et dragons, la maîtrise des art martiaux chinois suffira-t-elle à un homme (ou à une « femme » ? ) pour survivre et retrouver le chemin vers un monde ordinaire ? Ou bien cet humble guerrier déclarera-t-il forfait ?
description.ja: 千年に一人の達人「脱魔」の域に達した魔教の教主、墨香。 しかし武林の支配を目論む張仁傑の怪しげな術により異なる世界へ飛ばされてしまう。 言葉も文化も分からない世界で、墨香の孤独な戦いが幕を開ける。
description.ko:
마교의 교주로서 극강의 무공을 자랑하던 묵향은 적들(혈교)에 의해 생전 처음 보는 생소한 이세계(판타지 세계)로 떨어지게 된다. 그곳에서 엘프, 마법사, 기사, 드래곤 등 새로운 존재들과 만나며... 무림 최고수 묵향이 원래 자신의 세상(무림)으로 돌아가기 위해 긴 모험을 떠나게 된다는 스토리.

한국의 무협소설과 판타지 문학을 사랑하는 수많은 독자들이 기다려왔던 초대형 이벤트― 웹툰계를 뒤흔들 다시없을 프로젝트가 시작된다! 
1999년부터 시작된 전설, 누계부수 300만부... 무협소설과 판타지문학을 접목시킨 기념비적인 장르소설인 [묵향]이 드디어 만화화!! 

한국 무협판타지의 한 획을 그었던 전동조 작가의 메가히트 장르소설 [묵향]을 만화화! 만화의 내용은 원작의 2부격인 [다크레이디] 편에서부터 시작한다.

description.ru:
Будучи мастером школы темных искусств и непобедимым незыблемым истым демоном, Мукхян, к несчастью, попадает в странный фэнтезийный мир из-за магии своих врагов (школа искусств крови). В новом мире эльфов, колдунов, рыцарей и драконов, разворачивается приключение Мукхяна по поиску пути назад в его старый мир, Мурим.

description.th: มุกฮยาง เจ้าสำนักปีศาจได้ถูกส่งตัวข้ามพิภพมายังโลกใหม่ที่ภาษา, วัฒนธรรมและทุกๆ อย่างได้แตกต่างจากยุทธจักรของเขาอย่างสิ้นเชิง ซ้ำร้ายยังต้องคำสาปให้กลายร่างเป็นเด็กผู้หญิงแสนบอบบางที่เขารังเกียจ แล้วเขาจะหาทางกลับคืนร่างและหวนกลับไปยังยุทธจักรของเขาได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 魔教教主墨香在经历脱胎换骨之后，修道成仙。 却在即将称霸武林之际遭人谋算，被移送至了精灵、魔法师、骑士、龙等生物共存的异世界里，墨香为了重回原来的世界，开始了冒险之旅！
description.pt-br: MookHyang, o mestre da Escola das Artes Profanas e o invencível Demônio Exposto, é infelizmente enviado a um mundo de fantasia estranho pela magia de seus inimigos da Escola das Artes de Sangue. Em um novo mundo com elfos, feiticeiros, cavaleiros e dragões, a aventura de MookHyang em busca de um meio para voltar ao seu velho mundo (Murim) tem início.
description.zh-hk:
身懷絕世武功的魔教教主墨香，被來自血教的敵人
送往生平從未見過的陌生異域(奇幻世界)。
在那裡，他遇上了精靈、魔法師、騎士、龍族...等
前所未聞的人事物。
為了回到原本的世界(武林)，
武林第一人墨香踏上旅程，一場大冒險就此展開!

喜愛韓國武俠小說與奇幻文學的讀者
引頸期盼的超大型活動!
震撼Webtoon界的絕倫企劃正式啟動!
1999年開始連載的傳說之作、累積銷量高達300萬冊...
結合武俠與奇幻的劃時代小說「墨香」，終於漫畫化!!

為韓國奇幻武俠立下全新里程碑的大師級作家
JEON DongZo精心打造的超高人氣小說「墨香」，
終於漫畫化啦!!

漫畫內容由原著第二部《Dark Lady》開展。

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

description.en:
(from amazon.jp):
Shigeru Mizuki depicts the life of the dictator who shaped the 20th century!　

In addition to the title story, which carefully traces the strange fate of Adolf Hitler, this volume also includes a Beethoven biographical manga and rare short essay works from a wide range of adult-oriented magazines. 

The book is packed with the charm of Mizuki's verse, which depicts a wide variety of themes.　

Commentary: "Hitler is a monster who appeared in human society" by Taro Minamoto (mangaka and manga critic)

[Official English](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/shigeru-mizukis-hitler/)

description.en:
A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god.   
  
However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god? This is the story of the Pig Prince's struggle to lose weight!  
  


---
description.id:
Seorang pemuda yang mengalami kecelakaan pesawat saat pulang dari perjalan binis di luar negeri direinkarnasi ke dunia lain setelah diminta oleh dewi untuk mengalahkan dewa jahat.   
  
Akan tetapi, ia tereinkarnasi sebagai seorang pangeran bodoh. yang terkenal di kalangan ningrat dengan julukan "Pangeran Orc/Pangeran Babi" karena penampilannya yang gendut dan jelek. Sit-up saja tidak bisa, apalagi mengalahkan dewa jahat? Inilah kisah perjuangan si Pangeran Babi dalam menurunkan berat badan!

description.en:
Wouldn’t it be a dream to wake up in a world of your own creation? For Kim Hajin, it’s nothing short of a nightmare. 

With no clue how or why he’s been transported into his web novel — as a mere extra, no less! — Hajin has little choice but to see his story through until the end. Lucky for him, as the author, he knows this perilous world like the back of his hand. 

But when discrepancies in the plot begin popping up left and right, Hajin soon realizes that things aren’t quite so simple, after all…

---

description.ko:
"나는 누구지?"

이 세상은 내가 쓴 소설.
그러나 나는 단 한 번도 쓴 적 없는 인물이 되었다.

얼굴은 물음표에다,
소설 속 그 누구와도 접점이 없는,
아무도 기억 못할 그런 인물.

영웅 아카데미에 입학한 엑스트라, 아니 소설 속 먼지가 살아남는 법.

남은 소설 분량까지 버텨야 한다!

title.en: Margrave’s Bastard Son was The Emperor

altTitles.pt-br: O Filho Bastardo de Margrave era o Imperador

description.en:
He became the Emperor when he was just a boy and was beheaded before reaching adulthood. It was a tragedy brought about by his fate as the first noble wizard.

“Ian, don’t be born in your next life.”

He thought everything was over, listening to the traitor’s heartless words. He knew, but…

“You are a symbol of peace. Where else would you find such honor as a lowly one?”

He became the Margrave’s bastard son, whose family went extinct 100 years ago.
A lowly, unsophisticated one, destined to be sold as a hostage to the barbarians across the border.
description.pt-br: Eu ascendi ao trono de imperador ainda garoto, só para ser decapitado antes de virar adulto. Meu destino trágico veio de ser o primeiro mago nobre. "Ian, espero que você não nasça novamente." Com essas últimas palavras do traidor, acreditei que era o fim, mas... "Você é o símbolo da paz. Que honra maior teria para alguém tão inferior quanto você?" Eu virei o bastardo dos Margrave, que morreram no século anterior. Destinado a ser vendido como um peão para os bárbaros vulgares e insensíveis nas nossas fronteiras.

description.en:
A high school girl, Shizuku, who despairs of living after being bullied at school and sexually abused at home, attempts to commit suicide at a deserted shrine, where she is cursed with immortality by an eerie raven. 

Unable to even die, Shizuku decides to use her immortal body to inflict deathly retribution on her tormentors.

 A revenge drama about a high school girl with a different power in her hands!
description.ja:
学校ではいじめ、家庭では性的虐待を受けて生きることに絶望した女子高生・雫は寂れた神社で自殺を図るが、そこで雫は不気味な烏に不死の呪いをかけられる。

死ぬことすらできなくなった雫は、不死のからだを使っていじめた奴らに死の報復を与えると決意する。

異能を手にした女子高生の復讐劇!

description.en:
A little ecchi comedy where you are being kept by a cool, beautiful girl! When you woke up, you found yourself as the pet dog of a girl named Inukai-san! At school, Inukai-san has no expression on her face, but she's a dog lover who loves her dog to pieces! She loves dogs so much that she's going to turn you into a real dog, body and soul! An erotic comedy that makes you stop being human!  
 
- [Manga Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/inuninattara)
description.pt-br:
Uma pequena comédia ecchi onde você está sendo cuidado por uma garota legal e bonita! 

Quando você acordou, você se viu como o cachorro de estimação de uma garota chamada Inukai-san! Na escola, Inukai-san não tem nenhuma expressão no rosto, mas ela adora cachorros! Ela ama tanto cachorros que vai transformar você em um cão, de corpo e alma! 

Uma comédia erótica que faz você querer deixar de ser humano!

altTitles.ja-ro: Eroica Yori Ai wo Komete

description.en:
What happens when a gay art thief and a conservative NATO officer cross paths? Disaster, of course. 
Dorian is an aristocrat, a thief, and a hedonist; Klaus is a duty-driven espionage agent with no patience for fools.

Follow them as they chase each other across the globe – from Britain to Baghdad, from Alaska to Alexandria or Moscow to Madrid. 
Spectacular locations and non-stop adventures await!

The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!?　自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！　一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?　相思相愛な新婚夫婦の、激甘かけ違いラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

description.en: One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... 

They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: スロウスタート

description.en: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

altTitles.ja: レプリカだって、恋をする。

altTitles.en: Even a Replica Falls in Love

altTitles.vi: Kể Cả Bản Sao Cũng Biết Yêu

description.en:
On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests.

On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon.
I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sonao Aikawa, and that is me.
I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different.
I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow,
I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original.
I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love.

A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.
description.ru:
В дни, когда она болеет, в дни, когда у нее нудная дневная работа, в дни, когда у нее очередные контрольные.

В дни, когда ей лень идти в школу, обращаются ко мне.
Я - удобный заменитель тела девушки по имени Сунао Аикава, и это я.
Может, я и выгляжу точно так же, но характер у меня немного другой.
Я не могу свободно выходить на улицу, не могу даже строить планы на завтра,
Я - копия, чья миссия - работать на оригинал.
Я должна была стать копией, но я влюбилась.

Очень красивая и немного загадочная "история любви", которая происходит в городке на берегу моря.
description.vi:
Vào những ngày mà cô ấy bị cảm, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có một công việc tẻ nhạt, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có bài kiểm tra thường xuyên.

Vào những ngày mà cô ấy quá lười để đi học, tôi được gọi ra.
Tôi là vật thay thế cho cơ thể của một cô gái tên là Sonao Aikawa, và đó chính là tôi.
Tôi có lẽ trông giống hệt họ, nhưng mà tính cách của tôi thì có hơi khác một chút.
Tôi không thể tự do ra ngoài được, tôi cũng chẳng thể nào lên kế hoạch cho ngày mai.
Tôi chỉ được coi là một bản sao thôi, nhưng tôi đã biết yêu.

Một "chuyện tình" rất trong sáng và có chút bí ẩn diễn ra tại một thị trấn ven biển.
description.es-la:
En los días en que se siente enferma, en los días en que tiene la trabajosa tarea de ser responsable del turno, en los días de exámenes regulares...
 
Cuando ella no tiene ganas de ir a la escuela, me llaman a mí. Soy el duplicado de Sonao Aikawa, una niña llamada Sonao, un sustituto conveniente. 

Aunque nuestra apariencia es completamente idéntica, nuestras personalidades son un poco diferentes. No puedo salir libremente ni planificar mis propios planes para el día siguiente. Soy una réplica cuyo propósito es trabajar en beneficio del original. Eso es lo que se suponía que era, pero me enamoré.

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.
